message: Created comprehensive workspace.py service module with all required data access functions

functions_implemented: get_agent_logs(task_id, agent_id, lines) - Read log JSONL with tail support
get_task_summary(task_id) - Comprehensive task summary with agents/phases
features: File locking awareness for atomic reads
Fallback implementations if orchestrator modules unavailable
Support for both naming conventions (.jsonl and .stream-json)
